title: Automatic approval of entry-level positions after onboarding
preconditions: Pro account just completed onboarding successfully without selecting any positions.

steps.step_text: Complete the onboarding flow as per tc_001 (no positions selected, no resume).
steps.step_expected: Pro lands on the Open Shifts screen after account creation confirmation.

steps.step_text: Navigate to the Profile â€º Positions tab.
steps.step_expected: Six entry-level positions (General Labor, Warehouse Associate - Entry Level, Event Setup and Takedown, Custodial, Counter Staff / Cashier, Concession / Stand Worker) are displayed with status "Approved".

steps.step_text: Verify backend data via Django admin or GraphQL endpoint for the user profile positions list.
steps.step_expected: The six entry-level positions exist on the user profile with status=approved and approval_source="auto".

steps.step_text: Search the Open Shifts feed for a shift that requires one of the entry-level positions (e.g., General Labor).
steps.step_expected: Shift cards requiring the position are visible and can be tapped.

steps.step_text: Tap a shift requiring an entry-level position and observe the "Book shift" button.
steps.step_expected: "Book shift" CTA is enabled without requiring additional position approval.
